text: Pamela Reed (born April 2, 1949) is an American actress. She acts in both movies and television. In Kindergarten Cop, she played Phoebe O'Hara; in Junior, she played Angela (both alongside Arnold Schwarzenegger); and in The Simpsons, she played Ruth Powers. Reed was born in Tacoma, Washington. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Tacoma, Washington Category:1949 births Category:Living people
title: Pamela Reed
